title: New Forum?
content:
I'm not telling the Admins what to do, so this will be all hypothetical:

A new subforum could really help the activity of this forum. Only, it would have to be a very well placed forum that would not detract from Keen, but would get some activity back. Hopefully, it would bring some extra overflow activity into the Keen sections of this forum. So:

What subforum do you think could help boost activity on this forum?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: New Forum?
content:
- a sex and drugs forum
- a religious debate forum
- a slowchatforum
- a Dopefish forum
- a nonsense forums
- an 18+ forum
- an 18- forum
- a mod forum
- a dating forum
- a topic games forum

Some many ideas and so few users, but isn't that exactly what we need first to make a new specific subforum, more users?-----------------

Jamster! rules!

title: Re: New Forum?
content:
A dating forum? Well, I guess I just have to start being gay, considering the amount of females of my age around here (none). [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

Hmmm, dunno if subforums would help. They might, but then they just could have the opposite effect.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: New Forum?
content:
